mapper.select: select count(*) totalCount, scooter.status from cor_tenant_scooter scooter where scooter.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and scooter.dr = 0 group by status

select scooter.scooter_id as id, scooter.status as status, scooter.license_plate as licensePlate from cor_tenant_scooter scooter
order by scooter.status desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select scooter.scooter_id as id, scooter.status as status, scooter.model as model, scooter.license_plate as licensePlate from cor_tenant_scooter scooter where scooter.scooter_id = #{id} and scooter.tenant_id = #{tenantId}

select count(*) from cor_driver_scooter_history histroy inner join cor_driver driver on histroy.driver_id = driver.id and driver.dr = 0 inner join cor_user_profile profile on driver.user_id = profile.user_id and profile.dr = 0

select count(*) from cor_driver_scooter scooter inner join cor_driver_scooter_history histroy on scooter.scooter_id = histroy.scooter_id and scooter.begin_time = histroy.begin_time inner join cor_driver driver on histroy.driver_id = driver.id and driver.dr = 0 inner join cor_user_profile profile on driver.user_id = profile.user_id and profile.dr = 0

select histroy.id as id, histroy.scooter_id as scooterId, histroy.begin_time as assignedTime, histroy.end_time as removeTime, histroy.driver_id as driverId, profile.first_name as driverFirstName, profile.last_name as driverLastName, ifnull(histroy.mileage,0) as mileage from cor_driver_scooter_history histroy inner join cor_driver driver on histroy.driver_id = driver.id and driver.dr = 0 inner join cor_user_profile profile on driver.user_id = profile.user_id and profile.dr = 0
order by histroy.begin_time desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select histroy.id as id, histroy.scooter_id as scooterId, histroy.begin_time as assignedTime, histroy.end_time as removeTime, histroy.driver_id as driverId, profile.first_name as driverFirstName, profile.last_name as driverLastName, ifnull(histroy.mileage,0) as mileage from cor_driver_scooter scooter inner join cor_driver_scooter_history histroy on scooter.scooter_id = histroy.scooter_id and scooter.begin_time = histroy.begin_time inner join cor_driver driver on histroy.driver_id = driver.id and driver.dr = 0 inner join cor_user_profile profile on driver.user_id = profile.user_id and profile.dr = 0
order by histroy.begin_time desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select scooter.scooter_id as id, scooter.license_plate as licensePlate, ifnull(csrs.co2_total, 0) as co2, ifnull(csrs.saved_money, 0) as monty from cor_tenant_scooter scooter left join cor_scooter_ride_stat csrs on csrs.scooter_id = scooter.scooter_id and csrs.dr = 0 where scooter.scooter_id = #{id} and scooter.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
